name: [Unstable] Subgay Surfer
description:
THE NAME....... Was made after subway surfer but I was uncreative so...

Two player game, or single player if your cunning.

Controls: P1: W/S and P2: UP/DOWN

Eat food and get points

Red can go through red passages, vice versa for blue

CANT go through purple.

Bug: you really don't have 3 lives so suck it up.....
